name: Sollt.
description: Sollt. is a new menswear and lifestyle brand. Based in Heaton Chapel we're offering free delivery to SK4 postcodes.
safetyTips: As an online store, shopping is as safe as can be. Our free delivery to SK4 will be contact-less. If we can't post your package through your letter box we'll knock on your door/ring your bell, leave your package in front of your door and step away to at least the 2 metres distance whilst we wait for you to collect.
